[1-1,1-2] Add .gitignore and LICENSE

- Add standard .gitignore for web projects
- Add MIT license

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
[1-3,1-4,1-5] Add HTML page structure

- index.html: Hero, countdown, RSVP, dress code sections
- events.html: Timeline skeleton for wedding events  
- travel.html: Travel guide, venue, accommodation sections
- Semantic HTML with ARIA labels
- Mobile-first responsive structure

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

[1-6,1-7] Add CSS and JavaScript foundation

CSS \(style.css\):
- Complete color system with CSS variables
- Event theme palettes \(Heritage, Glamour, Carnival, Royal\)
- Typography system with Google Fonts
- Base layout and content panel styles
- Navigation with mobile hamburger menu
- Hero section with countdown styling
- Footer styles
- Accessibility \(skip link, focus states, reduced motion\)

JS \(main.js\):
- IIFE structure for encapsulation
- Navigation toggle for mobile
- Countdown timer to wedding date
- RSVP form handler skeleton
- Keyboard event handling

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

EOF
